DescriptionData.Title: Silly Farm Split Cakes - FireFly (2 oz)
DescriptionData.Description:
Rainbow Cakes for face painting are perfect for one stroke colorful and startling effects. Rainbow cakes are multi-colored containers of paint: strips of color that are side by side, making a "rainbow." A stroke from a rainbow cake allows you to lay down several colors at once. Rainbow cakes are excellent for base work for any design.
Picking up the colors from a Rainbow cakes is best done with a half sponge or a body brush. Face Paint Stencils also work well with Rainbow cakes.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Each 2 ounce Silly Farm FireFly Split Cake is good for 75-200 applications
Firefly Rainbow Cakes include strips of Purple, Red, Hot Pink, Orange, Yellow and White face paint
Allows you to pick up a rainbow of color in one broad stroke
Split cakes are an easy tool to enhance your face painting designs
Excellent for face or full body
